import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var dataSlice=createSlice({//lay data tu trang chu khi chay lan dau
name:"dataSlice",initialState:{currentData:[]},reducers:{getData:function getData(state,action){state.currentData=action.payload;}}});export var dataActions=dataSlice.actions;export default dataSlice.reducer;
